pullrequest.title: Fix include paths for new OGRE2 directory structure

content.raw:
`component_INCLUDE_DIRS`  is already set to `OGRE2_INCLUDE_DIRS` earlier so may result in duplicate paths in the list?

I think this gets rid of duplicates:

```
diff -r f7f63e77dbb3 cmake/FindIgnOGRE2.cmake
--- a/cmake/FindIgnOGRE2.cmake  Tue Jul 16 14:57:00 2019 -0500
+++ b/cmake/FindIgnOGRE2.cmake  Tue Jul 16 21:42:23 2019 -0700
@@ -189,10 +189,8 @@
           get_filename_component(dir_name "${dir}" NAME)
           if ("${dir_name}" STREQUAL ${IGN_PKG_NAME})
             set(dir_include "${dir}/Hlms/Common")
-          else()
-            set(dir_include "${dir}")
+            list(APPEND component_INCLUDE_DIRS ${dir_include})
           endif()
-          list(APPEND component_INCLUDE_DIRS ${dir_include})
         endforeach()
       endif()
```
